item.title: Error!
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == false && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x03E; //cow dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 41) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x039; //chicken dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 87) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead } { if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026){ //Barrows Dharok npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.dharok = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2025){ //Barrows Ahrim npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.ahrim = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2027){ //Barrows Guthan npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.guthan = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2028){ //Barrows Karil npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.karil = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029){ //Barrows Torag npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.torag = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2030){ //Barrows Verac npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.verac = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2036){ //Barrows Skeletons npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; } [code][/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 11:31:14 PM[/size][hr]nvm i think im just going to remove it

item.title: Error!
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

You added an extra {:

[u][b]{[/b][/u] if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026){ //Barrows Dharok [b]^ here[/b] npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.dharok = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2025){ //Barrows Ahrim npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.ahrim = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2027){ //Barrows Guthan npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.guthan = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2028){ //Barrows Karil npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.karil = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029){ //Barrows Torag npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.torag = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2030){ //Barrows Verac npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.verac = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2036){ //Barrows Skeletons npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; }

item.title: Error!
item.dc:creator: @d3adp00l d3adp00l
item.description:
@d3adp00l wrote:

the error is
NPCHandler.java:995: illegal start of expression
public static boolean IsDropping = false;
^
this is what i added

} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == false && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x03E; //cow dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 41) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x039; //chicken dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 87) { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead } { if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026){ //Barrows Dharok npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.dharok = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2025){ //Barrows Ahrim npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.ahrim = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2027){ //Barrows Guthan npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.guthan = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2028){ //Barrows Karil npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.karil = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029){ //Barrows Torag npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.torag = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2030){ //Barrows Verac npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; client.verac = true; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2036){ //Barrows Skeletons npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; client.barrowskillcount++; } [code][/code]
